        NamePattern { "%d%t%f%t%g%t%m" }

            "\u2030",

            "#,##0%",
    }

        InternationalFormat { "+%c %a %l" }
        DomesticFormat { "" }
        InternationalDialCode { "" }
        InternationalPrefix { "27" }
    }
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            DateTimePatterns{
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    ", dd MMMM, yyyy yil, EEEE",
